body: Currently game.log only logs the last game. It should track multiple games, with a limit on the log size.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: log multiple games in game.log
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on January 30, 2013 08:44:49_

Currently game.log only logs the last game. It should track multiple games, with a limit on the log size.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=326_
